actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs..

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide an annual clothing allowance to certain veterans who, because of a service-connected disability, wear a prosthetic appliance or appliances which tends to wear out or tear their clothing.

summary.text: Provides an annual clothing allowance of $300 to veterans who, because of a service-connected disability, wear a prosthetic appliance or appliances which tends to wear out or tear their clothing.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide an annual clothing allowance to certain veterans who, because of a service-connected disability, wear a prosthetic appliance or appliances which tends to wear out or tear their clothing.
